titleStmt.title: The true history of the tragicke loves of Hipolito and Isabella Neapolitans. Englished
Amours tragiques d'Hyppolite et Isabelle. English
titleStmt.author: Meslier, fl. 1610.
Hart, Alexander, fl. 1640, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho: Harper, and Nath: Feild,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Meslier. Les amours tragiques d'Hyppolite et Isabelle.
Authorship sometimes attributed to Alexander Hart.
Running title reads: The tragicall history of Hipolito and Isabella.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
